channel.title: Scar and DirectX
channel.description:
I'm sure many of you are aware of how scar does not work with directx games(colors change everytime you move), but I have a few questions about that:
- Would scar still work on a 2D directx game? Such as maple story?
- Does it only account for 3D models? Or does it just not work on ANYTHING directx related?
- Is it be possible to create scripts for maple story?
Thanks, and <3 to anyone who replies :D [br][size=1]Posted at: June 12, 2006, 04:19:39 pm[/size][hr]Anyone??

item.title: Scar and DirectX
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Alright, thats as good as an answer I needed.

There is a general game cheating forum that I hang around(and that I am a mod on) of 34k members, and the sad part is that I am one of their smartest members(I know, it’s shocking). There is only like 5-6 other members there with some decent brains, and they wanted my help to create a maple story script since macroing doesnt seem to be much of a problem(hacking is though) so you probably wouldn’t get banned easily. I told them scar doesn’t work with directx etc… But I thought I’d ask about it about it here.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar and DirectX
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I have never played maple story, but from what I hear SCAR doesnt work on directx at all, but Im not really sure

Read full topic
